name: saxxyawards
title: Saxxy Awards
description: The Community Saxxy Awards was an attempt to revive the Team Fortress 2 film-making festival, discontinued by the game's developer (Valve) a few years ago. Unfortunately, due to lack of response from Valve, I had to cancel the project out of copyright concerns - but the designs still look great!
writeup:
The Community Saxxy Awards was an attempt to revive the Team Fortress 2 film-making festival, that was discontinued by the game's developer (Valve) a few years ago. Unfortunately, due to lack of response from Valve, I had to cancel the project out of copyright concerns - but the designs still look great!

This was my first ever Next.js project, and it included full user profiles, submission uploading, voting, and Google/Steam API integrations for profile creation and sign-on.
